titles.title: Banning Microtargeted Political Ads Act

To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit online platforms from disseminating political advertisements which are targeted to an individual or to a group of individuals on any basis other than the recognized place in which the individual or group resides, and for other purposes.
Banning Microtargeted Political Ads Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary:
Banning Microtargeted Political Ads Act
This bill generally prohibits online platforms (e.g., websites, mobile applications, and social networks) from disseminating political advertisements that are targeted to an individual or a specific group of individuals based on personal information, other than place of residence, that is linked to a specific individual or device.
